column5: Hey guys could anyone point me in the direction of a free launch and conditions of the launch if possible to lake st Clair lighthouse cove please.

Kaytar, this link is right to the launch.  https://www.google.ca/maps/dir/Hamilton,+ON/42.3178448,-82.4535721/@42.7619543,-81.7275076,181621m/am=t/data=!3m2!1e3!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m5!1m1!1s0x882c986c27de778f:0x2b6aee56d8df0e21!2m2!1d-79.8711024!2d43.2557206!1m0!3e0?hl=en
Awesome thanks so much...will be my first time!!!
Good luck and let us know how you make out.
Well boys was a great day on the water..we ended up getting one 40 inch tiger...grea day
Well done ! Never fished Lake St.Clair, but it's on the bucket list. I have a lot of buckets !
Right on! Did you head out in the lake or just fish the rivermouth/channel heading out?
nope def fishing out in the lake...spoke to several boats and very few even had a hit that day...maybe to hot and super flat..fishing into the dark as well...all in all a fun day!
